attributes.action: Move the Bus Stops on Highworth Road Swindon
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to support and enforce the relocation of the bus stops on Highworth Road Swindon between the Rat Trap pub roundabout and the Honda North roundabout.

The re-positioning of the stops should be

South bound traffic - under the bridge near the Rat Trap roundabout in the bus lane

North bound traffic - located in the bus lane opposite the large B&Q warehouse.

This would increase the safety of the pedestrians and other road traffic users.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
